description: This file defines a Flutter widget 'ChatMessageBubble' used for displaying individual chat messages in a chat UI. It formats message content and timestamp, aligning messages based on the sender, and styles the message bubble accordingly.

classes.name: ChatMessageBubble
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a chat message in a styled bubble, aligning it based on the sender and showing message content with timestamp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the chat message bubble, including alignment, styling, and child widgets displaying message content and timestamp.

methods.name: _getTimeString
methods.description: Formats the message's DateTime into a user-friendly string, showing time, 'Yesterday', or date.
